job_history.work_description: Drafting legal documentation necessary for cross-border aircraft financing and leasing transactions, with particular emphasis on clients based in the Asia Pacific region involving major global financial institutions, operating lessors and investment funds.

Acting as in-house counsel and preparing legal letters and notices and drafting and vetting service agreements, non-disclosure agreements, digital marketing partners engagement agreements, broker agreements, intermediary agreements, procurement agreements, employment contracts, licensing agreements etc.
Legal research on Finance Act viz. Importation of Services and Taxation of various Services, Operating Lease, Finance Lease and reversal of Cenvat Credit.
Study of legal formalities to be complied with by a foreign listed company willing to establish an office in India.
Legal Research on Company Law, Joint Venture rules, Mergers and Acquisitions laws and Securities and Exchange Board of India Regulations.
Assisting a team of qualified stakeholders in research and preparing a report on the Value Added Tax provisions of the proposed Goods and Service Tax Bill.

skills.name: Contract Drafting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience drafting various types of agreements and contracts, including service agreements, non-disclosure agreements, and employment contracts, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Acted as in-house counsel and prepared legal letters and notices, demonstrating strong proficiency in compliance.

skills.name: Legal Research
skills.explanation: Conducted extensive research on various laws and regulations, including Company Law, Joint Venture rules, Mergers and Acquisitions laws, and Securities and Exchange Board of India Regulations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Aircraft Financing and Leasing
skills.explanation: Drafted legal documentation for cross-border aircraft financing and leasing transactions, showing strong proficiency in this area.

skills.name: Taxation
skills.explanation: Conducted research on taxation laws, including the Finance Act and Value Added Tax provisions, demonstrating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Corporate Law
skills.explanation: Has experience with company law, joint ventures, and mergers and acquisitions, indicating strong proficiency in corporate law.

skills.name: Cyber Laws
skills.explanation: Completed a post-graduation diploma in Cyber Laws, but no direct work experience is mentioned, indicating some practical knowledge.
